english.segment1: Please make this heart of mine. Synchronize your beat. Only Your words will I speak. To feel Your love and mercy. Shine on through me. To make me feel complete
english.segment2: Take all of me. I'm falling on my knees. So I can see
english.segment3: I have made my choice to follow. I'll worship You alone forever
english.segment4: Let Your rain fall down on me. Feel the warmth of Your embrace. To know that this is grace. May I forever sing Your praise. Give glory to Your name. I'll love you all my days
english.segment5: Take all of me. I'm falling on my knees. So I can see
english.segment6: I have made my choice to follow. I'll worship You alone forever
english.segment7: I'm calling on You now. With open arms I pray that I'll be found. To know Your love's abound. Your grace and mercy finds me even now
